Sparkling Wine and Berries Gift Set
List.Description:
This dessert bubbly pairs perfectly with berries, making it a wonderfully delicous surprise for any occasion.

Wine Gift Includes:

  • Fizz 56 Brachetto
    Fizz 56 Sparkling Red is a showstopper that is not only alluring, but also irresistibly delicious. Enjoy tantalizing flavors of raspberry, strawberry and cherry that dance on the tip of your tongue.

  • Chocolate Covered Cherries
    Luscious Bing cherries enrobed in delicious milk chocolate and then covered with an all-natural cherry coating.

  • Chocolate Covered Strawberries
    Premium dried strawberries enrobed in delicious milk chocolate, finished with an exclusive all-natural strawberry coating.

  • Festive Greet Sheet

Due to the popularity of this gift, wines or vintages sometimes sell out. Should this happen, we will always substitute with the current vintage and wines with equal or greater value.

Wine gift sets & baskets may be packaged with the bottles separately boxed for their protection during shipment.

Pursuant to state laws in New York, gifts that contain both food and wine will be sent in two separate packages.

Thank You with Dom Perignon & Godiva Truffles Gift Set
List.Description:
Show your appreciation with the best of the best! Dom Perignon and Godiva are legendary brands that have set the standard for combining luxury with heavenly taste. Known for their artful approach to perfecting vintage Champagne, Dom Perignon is the ideal pairing for Godiva's ultimate dessert truffles. Each of these heavenly truffles are filled with sumptuous fillings and ganaches inspired by classic and on-trend desserts like Chocolate √âclair, Red Velvet Cake, Cr√®me Brulee, and Chocolate Lava Cake.

List.Name: Aerating Pour Spout
List.Description: Introducing the ultimate multi-tasker. This pour spout easily and beautifully aerates wine with an air-blending helix to bring out its full flavor. Includes an angled spout to prevent spills, as well as a sediment filter and aerator. Constructed from acrylic and rubber, it's extremely durable and easy to clean. Just place the spout in your bottle of wine and pour!

Pink Corkcicle Wine Chiller
List.Description:
As seen on Oprah's Favorite Things, the Corkcicle allows you to chill wine from the inside. This wine chiller can be placed inside any wine bottle to make it the correct temperature. Corkcicle keeps chilled whites chilled and cools room-temp reds without ice. No excessively warm or chilled wine. Just the right temperature each time, every time.

Simple to use:

  • Step 1:
    Freeze your Corkcicle. For whites, pour the first chilled glass. For red, pour out a "taste" to make room for Corkcicle.
  • Step 2:
    Insert into the wine bottle to cool room temp reds in 15min or keep whites perfectly chilled for an hour.
  • Step 3:
    To refill glasses, simply pull 75% out of the bottle. Tilt bottle over glass to fill.

Thank You Sparkling Wine Trio Gift Set
List.Description:
A sincere Thank You is always appreciated and our Sparkling Wine Trio is a perfect way to show your gratitude. With three bottles of bubbly, our gift is sure to make your appreciation sparkle.

Wine Gift Set Includes:

  • Poema Cava Brut:
    Vibrant aromas of ripe peaches, pears and toasted bread with a hint of spice fill the nose on the Spanish sparkling. Layers of flavor include orange rind and spice that persists through an elegant finish.

  • Nina Franco Rustica Prosecco:
    This non-vintage, light-bodied Prosecco offers gorgeously elegant, fresh, lively fruit, notes of bread dough and citrus, and persistent effervescence.

  • Kenwood Yulupa Sparkling:
    Light and refreshingly balanced, this sparkling wine has fruit flavors and aromas of citrus, pear, peaches, followed by a nuance of spice.

  • Festive Greet Sheet (as pictured)

    Due to the popularity of this gift, wines or vintages sometimes sell out. Should this happen, we will always substitute with the current vintage and wines with equal or greater value.

Tres Vinos Spanish Wine Gift Trio
List.Description:
Discover Spain's stylish mix of the traditional and modern with three wines that represent the country's diversity: Bodegas Fillaboa's crisp and aromatic Albari√±o, La Montesa by Palacios Remondo, a modern style Rioja, and Bodegas Bilbao Limited Edition, a traditional style Rioja.

Wine Gift Trio Includes:

  • Bodegas Fillaboa Albarino Rias Baixas
    Soft on the palate, this wine has well integrated acidity and a balanced flavor profile that enhances its freshness and complexity.

  • Palacios Remondo La Montesa
    On the palate, this wine is unctuous and voluminous, with soft tannins and a foundation of mixed berries, blood oranges and dark chocolate.

  • Bodegas Ramon Bilbao Limited Edition Rioja
    On the nose, this Rioja's fine notes of tar with sweet and fresh red-berry fruit are inspiring. A mineral acidity and concentrated cherry fruit come through and balance out to a dense and pure finish.

    Due to the popularity of this gift, wines or vintages sometimes sell out. Should this happen, we will always substitute with the current vintage and wines with equal or greater value.

List.Name: JCB N¬∞21 Brut Cremant de Bourgogne
Denis Sarda Bobo Cru Haut Valoir 2006
Quintessential Case Wine Gift Collection
List.Description:
This collection of wine showcases the quintessential varietals from the most famous wine regions, chosen to best represent the area from which they come.

Wine Gift Collection Includes:

  • France: Domaines Baron Rothschild Reserve Speciale Bordeaux Rouge
    Expressive and elegant, with smooth tannins and notes of dried fruit, this wine reflects why Bordeaux is the quintessential red of France.

  • Italy: Frescobaldi Nipozzano Chianti Riserva
    This food-friendly wine, made from 90% Sangiovese, showcases the typical bright fruit and acidity of Tuscan wines.

  • Argentina: Ricardo Santos Malbec
    This classic Malbec is plump and juicy, with deep color, ripe fruit and spice, velvety tannins and a weighty finish.

  • Chile: Santa Ema Selected Terroir Carmenere
    The well-balanced palate presents intense black fruits, such as black and blue berries, with a touch of tobacco and mild, ripe tannins.

  • Australia: Peter Lehmann Clancy's Shiraz/Cabernet
    A classic Aussie blend of Shiraz and Cabernet Sauvignon, this wine is supple and silky, with lots of dark fruit, spice and chocolate.

  • Spain: Bodegas Ramon Bilbao Crianza Rioja
    Crianza is a young style of wine from the region of Rioja, made from 100% Tempranillo. This wine has fresh, ripe berries and a backbone of toasty oak flavors.

  • Austria: Domane Wachau Federspiel Terrassen Gruner Veltliner
    Subtle, yet racy! A perfect food wine, showing excellent acidity, a textured mouthfeel and a spicy finish.

  • California: Concannon Conservancy Chardonnay
    Creamy, yet fresh, ripe fruit flavors are backed by a clean minerality in this well-balanced California Chardonnay.

  • South Africa: Ken Forrester Chenin Blanc
    Tangy and fresh, with clean fruit and great acidity, this wine is perfect for everyday sipping or pairing with lighter fare.

  • New Zealand: Dashwood Sauvignon Blanc
    Distinctive, zesty and clean, this wine is perfectly refreshing with its citrus and grassy notes, a great match for seafood.

  • Italy: Ruffino Lumina Pinot Grigio
    Aromatic, with floral and citrus notes, the Lumina is a versatile, food-friendly Pinot Grigio that represents Italy well.

  • Argentina: Trumpeter Torrontes
    Offering up fresh and floral aromatics with a clean, zippy palate, this wine will remind you of spring in a bottle.

  • Printed insert that describes the featured wines

    Due to the popularity of this gift, wines or vintages sometimes sell out. Should this happen, we will always substitute with the current vintage and wines with equal or greater value.
